casebody.data:
LIBERTY LACE & NETTING WORKS, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. ACME TEXTILES, Inc., and Max Nimkoff, Impleaded, etc., Defendants-Appellants. No. 253. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 13, 1934. Maxwell E. Sparrow, of New York City, for appellants. Hans v. Briesen and Fred A. Klein, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
